title: Mini Baja
desc: Designed and built Mini Bajas while at Western

title: LAV 3 Up
desc: Designed LAVs hulls while at General Dynamics

title: Auxilary Hydraulic Power Unit
desc: While at Marcrest Manufacturing, I designed this power unit that uses a tractor PTO to provide hydraulic power to accessories, such as balers

title: Heavy Duty Bale Grapple
desc: While at Marcrest Manufacturing, I designed this to carry large stacks of hale bales

title: Power Hitch
desc: While at Marcrest Manufacturing, I designed this to split a tractor's PTO power between 2 hay balers

title: Automated Cupcake Icing and Sprinkling Machine
desc: Title says it all, I designed this while at Krew Industrial

title: Piano Floor
desc: While at RMA, I designed this Piano Floor that lights up and plays notes when people step on the keys (similar to the one in the movie Big)

title: Scale and Panel
desc: While at RMA, I designed this weigh scale with push-button panel, where selecting a button displays your weight on different planets

title: Sensors Array for Slide
desc: While at RMA, I designed a touch panel that sits at the slide entrance and a sensor array that sits ontop of the slide to detect when a person slides past

title: Industrial Centrifugal Fan
desc: One of many fans I designed at Daltec Process Fans
